text: Arhopala opalina, the opal oakblue, is a species of lycaenid or blue butterfly found in Assam, Burma, Thailand, the Malay Peninsula and Java. Khasia Hills, Patkai, in northern India from original description by Moore, 1884. ==References== Category:Arhopala Category:Butterflies of India Category:Taxa named by Frederic Moore Category:Butterflies described in 1883
title: Arhopala opalina
